item.description:
One-way hike from Cape Cod Bay, Truro to Newcomb Hollow Beach, Wellfleet. Meet 9:45 a.m. Newcomb Hollow Beach for car shuttle to Truro, Ryder Beach.Extended time: 2.5 to 3 hrs. From Rte 6 Orleans/Eastham Rotary, go 11 mi. Turn Right on Gross Hill Rd. Continue on Gross Hill Rd to Newcomb Hollow Beach.

The Thursday Hiking Club is meeting at 7:45AM in the parking lot of the Market Basket just off Route 6 in Sagamore for a 7:50 shuttle to breakfast.  Meet us there if you would like to carpool with us (we will be near the Bass outlet.) or join us at the beach.  We also plan to stop at the Fairway Restaurant on Route 6 in Eastham for breakfast on the way (plan is 8:30AM)

This is an AMC led hike, led by AMC member Janet Kaiser. Membership in the AMC is not required. Visit www.outdoors.org for more information on the Appalachian Mountain Club. As per usual dog policy, dogs do not go on AMC hikes.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Truro's crossed in a yellow wood
